title: Bracelet And Box, ca. 1840
medium: Acquamarine, gilt metal (bracelet); paper, gilt, velvet, satin (box)
creditline: Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane
description: Clasp bracelet in Gothic style, made of nine links of heart-shaped ornaments placed base to base with open flower larger units in a similar design with a pale blue stone.  Accompanying box  covered in dark red paper, tooled in gilt, and lined with velvet and satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Bracelet And Box, ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Acquamarine, gilt metal (bracelet); paper, gilt, velvet, satin (box). Bequest of Mrs. John Innes Kane. 1926-22-531-a,b.
